doc.field: A RM f1506reute b f BC-NYNEX-NYN>-UNIT-FILE 03-30 0059
NYNEX NYN> UNIT FILES TO OFFER DEBT SECUTITIES

New York Telephone Co, a unit of NYNEX Corp, said it filed with the Securities and Exchange Commission a shelf registration statement covering up to 500 mln dlrs of debt securities. Proceeds will be to refinance outstanding debt or for general corporate purposes, the company said. Reuter
